name: Ascendance (itch) (mo2970)
description:
Ascendance is a runner game about trying to climb to the great above.

Obstacles will attempt to stop you!

Controls (Keyboard/Mouse):

W,A,S,D - Move

Space - Glide

Left Mouse Button - Swing Sword

Right Mouse Button - Dash through walls

Controls (Controller):

Left Stick - Move

A- Glide

Right Trigger - Swing Sword

Left Trigger - Dash through walls

Gameplay footage:
https://youtu.be/h4AYQBUAVCQ
